attributes.action: Bring in legislation to make bullying in the work place a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: Workers that are bullied should have access to an independent ombudsman service with the power to prosecute the bullies and the companies who turn a blind eye.
attributes.background: Bullying in the workplace is a major cause of absenteeism, anxiety, depression and even suicide. It can ruin lives and livelihoods and can have a major impact on family life.
